sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Phone, Mail, MapPin, Clock, Send, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, MessageSquare, User, HelpCircle } from 'lucide-react'; import { contactAPI } from '../services/api'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; const ContactPage = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); try { await contactAPI.submit({ ...formData, type: 'contact' }); toast.success('Message sent successfully! We\'ll get back to you soon.'); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '' }); } catch (error) { console.error('Contact form error:', error); const message = error.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to send message'; toast.error(message); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const contactInfo = [ { icon: , title: "Phone", details: ["+91 98765 43210", "+91 87654 32109"], action: "tel:+919876543210" }, { icon: , title: "Email", details: ["cgsfarms07@gmail.com", "cgsfarms07@gmail.com"], action: "mailto:cgsfarms07@gmail.com" }, { icon: , title: "Address", details: ["CGS FARMS", "No. 4A, Sector 135 HPS FARMS", "Near wazidpur"], action: "https://maps.google.com" }, { icon: , title: "Hours", details: ["Mon - Sun: 24/7", "Check-in: 2:00 PM", "Check-out: 11:00 AM"], action: null } ]; const faqs = [ { question: "How far is the farm from Chennai city center?", answer: "Cozy Glory Shed is conveniently located at No. 4A, Sector 135 HPS FARMS, Near wazidpur, providing easy accessibility while maintaining a peaceful rural atmosphere." }, { question: "What activities are included in the stay?", answer: "Your stay includes farm tours, nature walks, bird watching, organic farming experience, bonfire arrangements, and access to our meditation spaces." }, { question: "Is food included in the booking?", answer: "Yes, complimentary breakfast is included. We also offer farm-to-table lunch and dinner options featuring fresh, organic ingredients from our farm." }, { question: "Do you provide transportation from Chennai?", answer: "We can arrange transportation from Chennai at an additional cost. Please contact us in advance to book this service." }, { question: "Are pets allowed at the farm?", answer: "Yes, we welcome well-behaved pets with prior approval. Additional charges may apply for pet accommodation." }, { question: "What is your cancellation policy?", answer: "Free cancellation up to 48 hours before check-in. 50% refund for 24-48 hour cancellations. No refund for same-day cancellations." } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Contact Us

Get in touch for bookings, inquiries, or just to say hello

{/* Contact Information */}

{info.icon}

{info.title}

{info.details.map((detail, detailIndex) => (

{info.action && detailIndex === 0 ? ( {detail} ) : ( detail )}

))}
))}
